text:
Hi Rebecca

It’s nice to meet you! I’m excited you are interested in 3D animation and rigging :) I love both and can’t wait to try to help answer questions and/or to try to give you support in your goals with either of those. I also hear you might be interested in modeling too? Those are all awesome areas to focus on, in my opinion haha :) It’s great that you are wanting to share some of your work too. Please do send it along!

I also wanted to try to introduce myself a bit, just in case it helps bring up any questions / so you know where I’m coming from.

I’m an animator and former rigger, currently working at MPC in London. I started out in VFX as a rigger at Framestore in London back in 2010 working on the movie Gravity. I worked at Framestore for over 7 years, the first 3 as a rigger/last four as a lead rigger.

Animation has always been my biggest passion, and I finally made the leap into being an animator about two years ago. I got a job animating at a few medium-sized studios at first, and moved over to my current job at MPC about a year ago.

Looking forward to getting this mentorship going!
Jarl

Also sorry I forgot to ask more about what you are up to! How did you get interested in 3D animation/rigging? What programme are you studying animation in right now? Is there any particular style of animation or movie/game/etc that really inspires you?
